document_title: Nephrotic syndrome: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_name: hoi-chung-than-hu.json_9_How to limit complications of nephrotic syndrome?
subsection_content:
Changing your diet will greatly support the treatment of nephrotic syndrome, specifically:
Low-fat, low-salt diet; Discuss carefully with your doctor about the amount of protein you need to supplement and the amount of water you need to drink every day.; Avoid lying down too much and instead be active to help eliminate water and prevent blood clots.; Use medication as prescribed by your doctor, do not arbitrarily stop using medication, or arbitrarily buy medication for treatment.
